title: Unspecified error while patching
body:
I have been trying to get my game to patch since yesterday, but at 33% it always says Unspecified error and begins again.
I've tried disabling my firewall and connecting to ethernet while it patches, tried deleting the lol_air_client folder, tried switching servers and switching back but it still keeps doing this.
Any help?

replies.body: At 33% your patching is transitioning over from scanning game files to connecting to the patching server for download.  The error you see may result from a network issue blocking you from establishing that connection.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot that.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I downloaded the hextech repair tool and made it force patch and add firewall exceptions... no help, I'm trying to reinstall it now. ):
